name: 2023 The 15th International Conference on Education Technology and Computers
content: Conference Proceedings: All papers will be strictly double blind reviewed by the program committee and reviewers, and accepted papers of ICETC 2023 after registration and presentation will be published in Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. \* ICETC 2017-ICETC 2022 Proceedings have been indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus. Journal International Journal of Information and Education Technology (Website: http://www.ijiet.org/) ISSN: 2010-3689 (Online) DOI: 10.18178/IJIET Abstracting/ Indexing: Scopus (CiteScore 2021: 1.3), INSPEC (IET), UGC-CARE List (India), CNKI, EBSCO, Electronic Journals Library, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. Journal Recommendation Selected conference papers will be invited to prepare extended version of conference paper to journal. Please make sure you have added at least 50% of new contents. Special Issue "Advancing Educational Research on Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning (CSCL): Innovative Solutions for New Challenges" Education Sciences CiteScore: 2.9 Indexing: ESCI, Scopus, CNKI, DOAJ, etc. For more details: https://www.mdpi.com/journal/education/special\_issues/ict\_edu#
